Test Name: Hepatitis B Virus Surface Antigen, Serum (HBsAg)
Specimen Type: Serum (preferred) or plasma (EDTA, heparin, or citrate)
Purpose: To detect the presence of Hepatitis B Virus Surface Antigen in patient samples, indicating an active Hepatitis B infection.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST); EDTA, heparin, or citrate tubes for plasma
